page.title: 19RECREATION
page.content:
The only recreational facility actually situated within the block is Nine Acres Farm Equestrian Centre. A wide range of sports participation facilities are available at Hinkley Leisure Centre and there are squash and badminton clubs at Market Bosworth.
The sports spectator needs to travel into Leicester where the following are available:- County Cricket ---- Grace Road Professional Football ---- Filbert St. Rugby Union ---- Welford Rd.
Other widespread recreational activities include fishing, rough shooting, vegetable and flower gardening and walking. Local footpaths and bridleways are generally well sign-posted and regularly used.
